typeProperties.script:
section Section1; shared #"tripdata" = let AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://njdatalakeg2.dfs.core.windows.net/demofiles/babs/data/201508_trip_data.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=******&sp=rwl"), Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]), TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)) in TrimmedHeaders;shared UserQuery = let
  Source = tripdata,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Start Date", type datetime}}),
  #"Week of year" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"Start Date", each Date.WeekOfYear(_), type number}}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Week of year", {{"Duration", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Changed column type 1", {"Start Date", "Start Station"}, {{"Count", each Table.RowCount(_), type number}, {"Total duration", each List.Sum([Duration]), type text}}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Grouped rows", {"Start Date", "Start Station", "Total duration", "Count"}),
  #"Changed column type 2" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Reordered columns", {{"Total duration", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Inserted division" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type 2", "Division", each [Total duration] / [Count], type number),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Inserted division", {{"Division", "Avg duration"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
